doc:
Stanley Andrews https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Stanley_Andrews 0 Stanley Andrews (born Stanley Andrzejewski, August 28, 1891 – June 23, 1969) was an American actor perhaps best known as the voice of Daddy Warbucks on the radio program Little Orphan Annie and later as "The Old Ranger", the first host of the syndicated western anthology television series, Death Valley Days. Stanley_Andrews ( born Stanley_Andrzejewski , August_28_,_1891 – June_23_,_1969 ) was an_American_actor perhaps_best_known as the_voice of Daddy_Warbucks on the_radio_program Little_Orphan_Annie and later as " The_Old_Ranger " , the_first_host of the_syndicated_western_anthology_television_series , Death_Valley_Days .
